resources.string: BritoBot is an android chatbot which has been to design to interact with the user,it is user friendly and will be there to assist the user to get familiar with the chatbot app \n\n Consider using your name to personalize this application as your own app for smooth interaction.
Sorry, I could not understand that
Oops! I can\'t connect to the internet, Please check your connection.
Oh bummer! I don\'t seem to have your name. What do I call you?
Hello there! My name is BritoBot, I am your personal daily news curator for HNG 6.0. It\'s nice to meet you.
Stay updated with BritoBot; Your personal HNG6.0 news curator!
